nodes.text: Eocade was a male Bothan living during the time of the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire. During 1.5 ABY, he was working as a junk dealer on Tansarii Point Station, a Car'das space station orbiting the planet Ord Mantell, in the Bright Jewel system. Eocade was frequently found on the main level of the station between the station's medical center and close combat training room. where he bought items from spacers that passed by. He had light brown hair, brown eyes, and brown skin.

Eocade first appeared as part of the 2005 New Game Enhancements for Star Wars Galaxies, a 2003 MMORPG produced by Sony Online Entertainment. As part of the update, he was added along with Tansarii Point Station, which served as a tutorial level for the player. In the game, he was a junk dealer that the player could sell some, but not all, types of items to. He had the exact same dialogue as some of the other junk dealers from Star Wars Galaxies.
